name: Rawani Food
overview:
Introduction: Manikchand Oxyrich

When you want the best from your team, shouldn’t you give them the best too?

For the first time ever Manikchand Oxyrich is the only bottled water among about 500 brands available which has 300% more Oxygen is enriched with essential minerals and is purified using the world’s leading technologies all together, to safely and completely quench thirst and energize your team.

Infrastructural Facilities: We have flourished a sound infrastructure unit so as to foster swish streamlining of many business activities. Sprawling across a good space, our unit is equipped with all the most recent equipment and sophisticated machinery, that is crucial to bring improvement in the product vary.

Customer Satisfaction: All the endeavors of our professionals are committed towards providing the maximum satisfaction to customers. Therefore, we leave no stone unturned in achieving excellence in each and every aspect associated with our domain. Our water treatment plant in the manufacturing unit is installed with the latest machines and techniques, which allow us to purify the water in an efficient manner.

Quality Policy: We offer our clients the best gamut of Packaged Drinking Water, which can surpass their expectations owing its quality. Our complete range is developed by making use of supreme quality required material, procured from the accredited vendors of the industry.

Why Us? The factors that help us in garnering the trust and confidence of customers are as discussed under:

Fresh Packaged water Strong infrastructure Experienced personnel Industry leading prices
